Flash memory¶

API for work with STM embedded flash memory¶

struct sk_sector

struct sk_sector - flash memory sector.

@uint32_t start: Address of sector beginning.

@uint32_t size: Size of sector in bytes.

@uint8_t num: Number of sector.

uint32_t sk_crc(uint8_t *data, uint32_t size)¶

sk_crc() - calculate CRC of data. @uint8_t *data: buffer with data. @uint32_t size: size of buffer.

Return: uint32_t. Return CRC digest of data.

sk_err sk_erase(struct sk_sector *sector)¶

sk_format() - erase sector. @struct sk_sector *sector: sector of flash memory to search.

Return: sk_err.

sk_err sk_flash_write(uint8_t *buffer, uint32_t size, uint32_t address)¶

sk_flash_write() - write data from buffer to flash memory. @uint8_t *buffer: buffer with data. @uint32_t size: size of buffer. @uint32_t address: adress in flash memory from which start writing data.

Return: sk_err.

sk_err sk_flash_read(uint8_t *buffer, uint32_t size, uint32_t address)¶

sk_flash_read() - read data from flash memory to buffer. @uint8_t *buffer: buffer to store read data. @uint32_t size: size of buffer. @uint32_t address: adress in flash memory from which start to read data.

Return: sk_err.

int sk_flash_empty()¶

sk_flash_empty() - check if flash memory is empty. @uint8_t *buffer: buffer to check. @uint32_t size: size of buffer.

Check if all bits of buffer are equal to 1.

Return: bool. Return true if memory is empty, false if not.

uint32_t sk_search(struct sk_sector *sector, uint32_t size, int write)¶

sk_search() - find empty space with chosen size in flash memory. @struct sk_sector *sector: sector of flash memory to search. @uint32_t size: size of required empty space in data_t elements (sizeof(data_t) bytes). @bool write: if true - return adress on start of empty space of given size,

if false - return adress on start of last note with given size.

Return: uint32_t.

sk_err sk_refresh(struct sk_sector *sector, struct sk_sector *sectornew, uint32_t size)¶

sk_refresh() - refresh flash memory sector. @struct sk_sector *sector: old sector. @struct sk_sector *sectornew: new sector (must be empty). @uint32_t size: size of note.

Copy recent note from sector to sectornew, erase sector, tag them. In the resuls sector has only recent note, sector new is empty.

Return: sk_err.
